references.name: Tailwind @apply documentation, used to apply tailwind classes to custom CSS

atDirectives.name: @tailwind
atDirectives.description: Tailwind CSS tailwind at rule, used to inject tailwind `base`, `components`, `utilities`, and `variants` styles into your CSS

atDirectives.name: @layer
atDirectives.description: Tailwind CSS layer at rule, used for injecting custom CSS into the tailwind styles

atDirectives.name: @config
atDirectives.description: Tailwind CSS config at rule, used to set the tailwind config file from a CSS file
